actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to redesignate the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund as the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Accounting Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Accounting Fund, respectively.
short_title: Straighter Talk on  Social Security Act of 2001
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Straighter Talk on Social Security Act of 2001 - Redesignates the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund as the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Accounting Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Accounting Fund, respectively.

titles.title: Straighter Talk on  Social Security Act of 2001

A bill to redesignate the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund as the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Accounting Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Accounting Fund, respectively.
